reviews.review_msg: Incredibly hard to work with. Always late to class, never prepared. Hated this class.

Class with her was so fun. I laughed the most in her class. The class is very comfortable. It focuses a lot on grammar, which sucks, but the atmosphere during classtime made up for it. She is always late (5-10 minutes), but only because she has another class before. She is very French, very funny, very fun. Great class.

She is one of the most honest, fair and caring profs out there. She is straightforward about her explanations for the class but is constantly working to ensure that each and every student gets the help and attention he or she needs. Although I'm not continuing with French I do wish I could have a class with her again!
Notes in class are very scattered and messy.  Disorganization is low point of class: GOOD LUCK...
